title: An Act designating a certain overpass in the town of Sandwich as the U.S. Marine Staff Sergeant Raymond G. Tourville Veterans Memorial Overpass

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Xiarhos of Barnstable, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Steven George Xiarhos that a certain overpass on State Route 6 in the town of Sandwich be designated as the U.S. Marine Staff Sergeant Raymond G. Tourville veterans memorial overpass.  Transportation.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
Reported, referred to the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Transportation

related_entities.name: committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Transportation
the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Transportation

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
